Syntax
[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property)]
public sealed class InputOptionAttribute : Attribute

InputOptionAttribute(String, InputOptionType, ControllerElement)

Initializes a new instance of the InputOptionAttribute class. Marks an attribute as an input option

Gets the type of this input option, whether it accepts keyboard only mappings, controller button mappings, or any type of mapping
